Name.description: The name of the downloadable tool or web user interface.

LongName.description: The long name of the downloadable tool or web user interface.

Type.description: The type of the downloadable tool or web user interface.

Version.description: The edition or version of the web user interface software, or tool. A value of 'NOT PROVIDED' may be used if the version is not available or unknown.

VersionDescription.description: This field provides users with information on what changes were included in the most recent version.

LastUpdatedDate.description: This element describes the latest date when the tool was most recently pushed to production for support and maintenance.

Description.description: A brief description of the web user interface or downloadable tool. Note: This field allows lightweight markup language with plain text formatting syntax. Line breaks within the text are preserved.

URL.description: The URL where you can directly access the web user interface or downloadable tool.

DOI.description: The Digital Object Identifier (DOI) of the web user interface or downloadable tool.

RelatedURLs.description: A URL associated with the web user interface or downloadable tool, e.g., the home page for the tool provider which is responsible for the tool.

SupportedOutputFormats.description: The project element describes the list of output format names supported by the web user interface or downloadable tool.

SupportedInputFormats.description: The project element describes the list of input format names supported by the web user interface or downloadable tool.

SupportedOperatingSystems.description: The operating system(s) and associated version supported by the downloadable tool.

SupportedBrowsers.description: The browser(s) and associated version supported by the web user interface.

SupportedSoftwareLanguages.description: The programming language(s) and associated version supported by the downloadable tool.

ToolKeywords.description: Allows for the specification of Earth Science keywords that are representative of the service, software, or tool being described. The controlled vocabulary for Science Keywords is maintained in the Keyword Management System (KMS).

Organizations.description: The tool provider, or organization, or institution responsible for developing, archiving, and/or distributing the web user interface, software, or tool.

Quality.description: Information about the quality of the downloadable tool or web user interface. This would include information about any quality assurance procedures followed in development. Note: This field allows lightweight markup language with plain text formatting syntax. Line breaks within the text are preserved.

AccessConstraints.description: Information about any constraints for accessing the downloadable tool or web user interface.

UseConstraints.description: Information on how the item (downloadable tool or web user interface) may or may not be used after access is granted. This includes any special restrictions, legal prerequisites, terms and conditions, and/or limitations on using the item. Providers may request acknowledgement of the item from users and claim no responsibility for quality and completeness.

AncillaryKeywords.description: Words or phrases to further describe the downloadable tool or web user interface.

ContactPersons.description: This is the contact persons of the downloadable tool or web user interface.

ContactGroups.description: Group(s) to contact at an organization to get information about the web user interface or downloadable tool, including how the group may be contacted.

SearchAction.description: This element contains information about a smart handoff from one web user interface to another.

MetadataSpecification.description: Requires the client, or user, to add in schema information into every tool record. It includes the schema's name, version, and URL location. The information is controlled through enumerations at the end of this schema.

URLType.description: Represents the Internet site where you can directly access the tool or web user interface.

Description.description: Description of online resource at this URL.

URLContentType.description: A keyword describing the distinct content type of the online resource to this resource. (e.g., 'DistributionURL').

Type.description: A keyword describing the type of the online resource to this resource. This helps the GUI to know what to do with this resource. (e.g., 'DOWNLOAD SOFTWARE').

Subtype.description: A keyword describing the subtype of the online resource to this resource. This further helps the GUI to know what to do with this resource. (e.g., 'MAP VIEWER', 'SIMPLE SUBSET WIZARD (SSW)').

URLValue.description: The URL for the relevant online resource where you can directly access the downloadable tool or web user interface.

RelatedURLType.description: Represents Internet sites that contain information related to the data, as well as related Internet sites such as project home pages, related data archives/servers, metadata extensions, online software packages, web mapping services, and calibration/validation data.

Description.description: Description of the web page at this URL.

URLContentType.description: A keyword describing the distinct content type of the online resource to this resource. (e.g., 'VisualizationURL').

Type.description: A keyword describing the type of the online resource to this resource. This helps the GUI to know what to do with this resource. (e.g., 'GET RELATED VISUALIZATION').

Subtype.description: A keyword describing the subtype of the online resource to this resource. This further helps the GUI to know what to do with this resource. (e.g., 'DATA RECIPE', 'SCIENCE DATA PRODUCT VALIDATION', 'GIOVANNI').

URL.description: The URL for the relevant web page (e.g., the URL of the responsible organization's home page, the URL of the collection landing page, the URL of the download site for the collection).

SupportedOperatingSystemType.description: This element describes the operating system(s) and associated version supported by the downloadable tool.

OperatingSystemName.description: The short name of the operating system associated with the downloadable tool.

OperatingSystemVersion.description: The version of the operating system associated with the downloadable tool.

SupportedBrowserType.description: This element describes the browser(s) and associated version supported by the downloadable tool.

BrowserName.description: The short name of the browser associated with the downloadable tool.

BrowserVersion.description: The version of the browser associated with the downloadable tool.

SupportedSoftwareLanguageType.description: This element describes the programming language(s) and associated version supported by the web user interface.

SoftwareLanguageName.description: The short name of the programming language associated with the downloadable tool.

SoftwareLanguageVersion.description: The version of the programming language associated with the downloadable tool.

SupportedFormatTypeEnum.description: This element contains a list of file formats supported by the tool.

ToolKeywordType.description: Enables specification of Earth science tool keywords related to the tool.  The Earth Science Tool keywords are chosen from a controlled keyword hierarchy maintained in the Keyword Management System (KMS).

OrganizationType.description: The organization or institution responsible for developing, archiving, and/or hosting the web user interface or downloadable tool.

Roles.description: This is the roles of the organization.

ShortName.description: This is the short name of the organization.

LongName.description: This is the long name of the organization.

Roles.description: This is the roles of the downloadable tool or web user interface contact.

ContactInformation.description: This is the contact information of the downloadable tool or web user interface contact.

GroupName.description: This is the contact group name.

Roles.description: This is the roles of the downloadable tool or web user interface contact.

ContactInformation.description: This is the contact information of the tool contact.

ContactInformationType.description: Defines the contact information of a downloadable tool or web user interface.

ServiceHours.description: Time period when the contact answers questions or provides services.

ContactInstruction.description: Supplemental instructions on how or when to contact the responsible party.

ContactMechanismType.description: Method for contacting the service or tool contact. A contact can be available via phone, email, Facebook, or Twitter.

Type.description: This is the method type for contacting the responsible party - phone, email, Facebook, or Twitter.

Value.description: This is the contact phone number, email address, Facebook address, or Twitter handle associated with the contact method.

ToolOrganizationShortNameType.description: The unique name of the service organization.

ToolOrganizationRoleEnum.description: Defines the possible values of a service provider role.

LongNameType.description: The expanded or long name related to the short name.

ToolTypeEnum.description: This element is used to identify the type of the downloadable tool or web user interface.

ToolQualityType.description: This object describes tool quality, composed of the quality flag, the quality flagging system, traceability and lineage.

QualityFlag.description: The quality flag for the tool or web user interface.

Traceability.description: The quality traceability of the downloadable tool or web user interface.

Lineage.description: The quality lineage of the downloadable tool or web user interface.

AccessConstraintsType.description: Information about any constraints for accessing the downloadable tool or web user interface.

UseConstraintsType.description: Information on how the downloadable tool or web user interface may or may not be used after access is granted. This includes any special restrictions, legal prerequisites, terms and conditions, and/or limitations on using the item. Providers may request acknowledgement of the item from users and claim no responsibility for quality and completeness.

LicenseURL.description: The web address of the license associated with the tool.

LicenseText.description: The text of the license associated with the tool.

AncillaryKeywordsType.description: Words or phrases to further describe the downloadable tool or web user interface.

SearchActionType.description: Information about a smart handoff from one web user interface to another.

SearchActionElement.description: This element contains the search action information needed to support a smart handoff.

ContactRoleEnum.description: Defines the possible values of a service provider role.

ContactMechanismTypeEnum.description: Defines the possible contact mechanism types.

AddressType.description: This entity contains the physical address details for the contact.

StreetAddresses.description: An address line for the street address, used for mailing or physical addresses of organizations or individuals who serve as contacts for the service.

City.description: The city portion of the physical address.

StateProvince.description: The state or province portion of the physical address.

Country.description: The country of the physical address.

PostalCode.description: The zip or other postal code portion of the physical address.

MetadataSpecificationType.description: This object requires any metadata record that is validated by this schema to provide information about the schema.

URL.description: This element represents the URL where the schema lives. The schema can be downloaded.

Name.description: This element represents the name of the schema.

Version.description: This element represents the version of the schema.
